entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
